pr_title: Hides parameters marked as hidden but preserving its context

timeline.message: Hides parameters marked as hidden but preserving its context

Redesigns the handling of hidden parameters

A new computeTemplateName now used by the pasta templates will return a new template with a hidden input instead of the actual template for hidden parameters.
